Posts.Content: I had a mammogram Friday and it should multiple nodules, 3 in my left breast and 2 in my right breast, i have been having a slight aching pain in both breast, I have to have an ultra sound needle biopsy Tuesday, would someone that's been through it please help me on how to deal with this, i've been worried to death, i thought the aching was not that serious. Thank you Fireflyy001
Posts.Title: Mammogram Showed Multiple Nodules Scared
